Reviews.Title: Didn't work for me
Reviews.Author: William Hall
Reviews.Content: This worked well when I could get it to work. I had it working for a while after I jumped through some hoops with the setup. Then it stopped working and I can't get it to work again. I wouldn't buy one of these again. It may work better with your network than it worked for me.

ProductInfo.Features:
150Mbps wireless N connectivity brings flexible placement
MJPEG streams for remote recording and local surveillance
1/4-Inch progressive scan CMOS sensor produces clear and crisp images at 30fps with a resolution of 640x480, even in low light environment
ProductInfo.Name: TP-Link TL-SC2020N 150N Wireless IP Surveillance Camera with Mobile View and Motion Detection (White)
